translation.es: - Te encanta esto, ¿verdad? - No. Bueno, sí.

translation.en: But if there's any way to convince you and Dennis, these are it.
translation.es: Si hay una forma de convencerlos a ti y a Dennis, es esta.

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah, yeah. -Every second counts.
Take it.
Look, man, make sure you try your hardest to convince me, all right? But just...
translation.es: Haz tu mejor esfuerzo para convencerme, pero...

translation.en: Just be safe, Claudette.
I don't want nothing to happen to you.
translation.es: No quiero que te pase nada.

translation.en: It's okay.
I'll see you yesterday.
[Jamaican man] What the bla... What the blazes is going...
Yo! What y'all deal wit? Why you gotta make so much damn noise and ting?
Where the hell is she?
-What took you so long? -[giggles excitedly]
CJ, what are you... What's going on?
-No time to explain. Come on. We gotta go. -What the fuck did you do?
translation.es: No hay tiempo, vamos. ¿Qué carajo hiciste?

translation.en: Domino! Domino on ya tail.
What is this? You don't know how to play no dominoes?
-[laughs] -[man] Hey, sonny.
You all right? You look like you could use a drink.
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Parece que necesitas un trago.

translation.en: No, I'm good. I'm just... I don't know. I just feel a little off today, man.
translation.es: Estoy bien. No sé, me siento un poco raro hoy.

translation.en: You need a drink.
Yo. We gotta go, dawg. This lame-ass nigga Jared here.
translation.es: Oye, debemos irnos. El idiota de Jared está aquí.

translation.en: What's up? You 'bout to do something, nigga?
What's up? -Hey, hey, hey! -Get the fuck out of here.
You better not light another one. You know these are for the cookout later.
translation.es: Será mejor que no enciendas otro. Son para la parrillada de hoy.

translation.en: Where did you get that?
CJ, you're headed the wrong way! We need to go to Carlito's! Come on!
translation.es: ¡CJ, por ahí no! ¡Debemos ir a lo de Carlito! ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Watch where you're going!
And y'all still look crazy.
[Dennis] She could definitely get it, huh?
[Dennis] Look at her!
Yo, don't let that Jared dude get to you, son.
translation.es: Oye, no dejes que Jared te afecte.

translation.en: No. I ain't thinking about him, nigga. It's just... I don't know.
translation.es: No estoy pensando en él. Es que... No sé.

translation.en: Something about today is just off, bro.
translation.es: Algo de hoy se siente raro, hermano.

translation.en: -[Dennis] Word. -[Calvin] Word.
Calvin! Calvin! Oh, my God! Thank God. Come on, we gotta get out of here.
translation.es: Calvin. Dios mío. Gracias a Dios. Tenemos que irnos.

translation.en: -What's wrong with y'all? -What the fuck is y'all wearing?
Y'all like some Space Odyssey wannabes.
translation.es: Parecen de Odisea en el espacio.

translation.en: -Dennis, shut up! Look. -[Sebastian] We have to get outta here. -[CJ] Shh. -[Sebastian] Come on!
What is this? Some sort of joke?
This shit supposed to be funny? It's a damn funeral program.
translation.es: ¿Te parece gracioso? Es un maldito programa funerario con mi cara borrosa.

translation.en: This shit got my face on it, disappearing and shit.
translation.es: Es un maldito programa funerario con mi cara borrosa.

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry, but you gotta listen to us, okay?
Can we go? The cops about to come. Come on!
translation.es: ¿Podemos irnos? La policía está por llegar.

translation.en: -Why would the cops come here? -You're going to get killed!
[Sebastian] CJ.
Okay. Okay. Real funny. Very funny, very creative.
Now y'all take that stupid shit y'all got on off!
-Y'all look ridiculous! -Look, Carlito's bodega just got robbed.
translation.es: - ¡Se ven ridículos! - Robaron la bodega de Carlito.

translation.en: -We gotta get out of here. -That's what I'm trying to tell you.
-Out of the way! -Where the fuck them niggas going, man?
Okay, remember these? You gave these to me. Remember what you said?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas esto? Me las diste. ¿Recuerdas lo que dijiste? "Sobre mi cadáver". Así las obtuve.

translation.en: "Over my dead body"? That's how I got these.
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas lo que dijiste? "Sobre mi cadáver". Así las obtuve.

translation.en: -What the fuck? You got my tags? -It's what I'm trying to tell you.
-Something bad is-- -Look, stop!
All right? I don't know when you snuck off and had copies made,
translation.es: No sé cuándo te escapaste e hiciste copias,

translation.en: but that shit is bootlegged, aight?
-Yo, fuck y'all. We out, bro. -Calvin! Jesus Christ!
translation.es: - A la mierda con esto. Nos vamos. - ¡Calvin!

translation.en: -The fuck is wrong with you, bro? Move! -Stop!
-This cannot be fucking happening! -Yo, what's going on? What's going on?
CJ. CJ, be calm.
NYPD, where y'all coming from?
translation.es: Policía de Nueva York. ¿De dónde vienen?

translation.en: -Don't touch your pockets. -Keep your mouth shut.
translation.es: - No saques nada de los bolsillos. - Cállate.

translation.en: -Officer, the ones you want-- -Keep your mouth shut!
I'm telling them what's going on!
-What's going on? -Stop talking! I'm serious.
-I need to see some IDs now. -[Calvin] What's the problem, officer?
translation.es: - Quiero sus identificaciones. - ¿Cuál es el problema?

translation.en: I said IDs, now.
-What you need to see IDs for? -IDs, now!
What, are you tough?
-Calvin. -[officer] Now!
Boy, you'd better shit me an ID, quick.
translation.es: Será mejor que me des una identificación.

translation.en: -You think I'm playing? -[Dennis] Give it to him, dawg.
-[Calvin] Bullshit, man. -[officer] Yeah, whatever. Stay put.
translation.es: - Carajo. - Sí, como sea. Quédate aquí.

translation.en: -We got the right to know what's going on. -Everyone be quiet, okay?
translation.es: - Tenemos derecho a saber qué pasa. - Necesito que se callen.

translation.en: If this got anything to do with Carlito's getting robbed, we didn't do it.
translation.es: Si tiene que ver con el robo en lo de Carlito...

translation.en: -I didn't mention that. -[CJ] Calvin, no. Stop.
-On the ground! -He didn't do anything!
Get on the ground! On the ground, now!
-He didn't do anything! -Get on the ground!
-On the ground! -[Sebastian] CJ, let's go!
-Get the fuck down! -Sebastian!
-[CJ] Sebastian! -[Sebastian grunts]
CJ! [grunts]
[officer] Stop resisting!
-[CJ] Sebastian! -[officer] Stay the fuck down!
[Calvin] It's okay.
I'll see you yesterday.
[Sebastian] Why didn't we stick to the plan and stop the robbers at the bodega?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no seguimos el plan y detuvimos a los ladrones en la bodega?

translation.en: What?
How many times have you jumped back, CJ?
I'm not stupid! I... You're wearing different clothing.
Claudette!
You got no right to hide shit from me.
translation.es: No tienes derecho a esconderme cosas.

translation.en: -How many times have you jumped back? -Once.
-Just once? -Yes, just once, I'm serious.
Why?
We had a surefire plan! And then you come a minute late,
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¡Teníamos un plan infalible! Llegas un minuto tarde y no lo hacemos. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: and we don't go through with it. Why?
translation.es: Llegas un minuto tarde y no lo hacemos. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Why? I'm asking a question!
Because you died, Sebastian.
You died...
'cause the surefire plan fell through.
But remember, now that I went back, it's like none of it happened.
translation.es: Pero recuerda que ahora que volví, es como si no hubiera pasado.

translation.en: No, no, no, CJ. You just told me that I get murdered!
translation.es: No, CJ. ¡Me acabas de decir que me asesinaron!

translation.en: I know. It's because we didn't do it right.
translation.es: Sí, porque no lo hicimos bien.

translation.en: No, CJ, that's it. We're not... We can't do this anymore.
translation.es: No, CJ, ya está. No podemos hacer más esto.

translation.en: I'm not willing to risk your life or my life ever again.
translation.es: No estoy dispuesto a arriesgar nuestras vidas otra vez.

translation.en: You're giving up?
On me?
On Calvin?
I thought your friends were like your chosen family.
translation.es: Pensé que los amigos eran como tu familia elegida.

translation.en: You are.
I can't afford to lose any more.
translation.es: No puedo perder a nadie más.

translation.en: [Sebastian] You coming?
Yeah.
I'm sorry.
CJ! CJ! What the fuck are you doing?
Stop! Stop! CJ, don't do this!
Stop! CJ!
Okay.
Five...
Where are the... Where are the keys to the garage?
...four...
[Grandpa] Boy, what is wrong with you?
...three...
CJ...
I love you, Sebastian.
